1451790.name: Panzer Paladin Classic 8-bit Soundtrack
1451790.description:
Official 8-bit version of the action-packed soundtrack for Panzer Paladin. Full soundtrack composed by Patrice Bourgeault. We wanted to offer you a more classic audio option. The free Challenge Core content update for Panzer Paladin lets the player choose between the original 16-bit soundtrack and the classic 8-bit soundtrack.

The original 16-bit soundtrack is also available:

﻿
